The game is so much fun to play, especially when you Survive With Friends. Though the game can be laggy and glitchy sometimes, it is for the most part, absolutely hilarious and can make for pretty entertaining screenshots. Whether killer, or survivor, this game brings people together and has even allowed me to make some new friends. This game and its DLCs are definitely worth the money.

Don't even get this game, The devs don't listen to the community, The community itself is very toxic, This game is only fun if you actually play it with friends, playing as killer is horrible. Generators pop left and right, It's either you constantly play the same 4 meta perks, meta killer.

-Recommended playing with friends.

I think this game is a blast to play with friends.  Each time is different because of the new player controlled survivors and killers. Only complaint is the occasional issues with matchmaking and getting kicked out. Also the inability to invite friends to party if you are playing as a killer.

ÃŠ um bom jogo, que pode se tornar melhor quando consertarem os varios bug que ainda existem, contudo os criadores parecem estar empenhados em consertar e melhorar o jogo isso um dos pontos mais positivos desse jogo os criadores realmente escutam(quase sempre) a comunidade.

This game will no longer be playable in 2022 ... It used to be a lot of fun when I started playing it in 2016! Over the years the game has been continuously developed with DLC's in the form of new killers, survivors & cards. But the developers do everything to make money like â‚¬ A!

At short intervals, sometimes not even 2 months, the developers knock out new killers like survivors, all well and good but bring countless bugs that will be fixed in upcoming small updates, but these updates in turn bring new bugs. A never-ending cycle of this game! In addition, the survivors were denied the option of dying on the hook in phase two. If survivors are caught in phase two, they have to miss two skill checks before they can die! An intervention that is absolutely annoying!
Then there are killers who camp on the hook and if you are rescued by a mate, the freed one is tunneled straight away until he lies down again!
The matchmaking is really bad, too, a killer is permanently assigned 4 troops in the matchmaking process which, as a killer, gives you no chance to hang up someone at all! If you think that you should just quit the game and start a new search, you are wrong!
The developers have introduced a 5 min ban if you intentionally leave the game & this increases with every Rage Quit. It doesn't even matter whether you have a disconnect or really leave the game out of anger in front of other players or killers ......
The worst is the community anyway ... Toxic survivors and killers in the after chat are commonplace! One is insulted and much more besides!


Absolutely NO purchase recommendation !!!! Not even when the game is on sale!

Really starting to like this game. Playing as the survivor is very intense and addicting. Stealth is the name of the game so you better be patient or you will end up on the hook. Level up your character and get perks and items in your inventory that you can use to help you escape. 

You can also play as the killer and use different items and perks to get the survivors and kill them.

It could be a bit buggy sometimes but its worth the money, try to buy this game with friends.

Well thought out game which is unique in which its kind of like playing tag with mates, but instead of tagging people, you hook them and maybe (if you're one of those muppets) camp the hooked fella, you lose those mates an become a loner.
el juego esta genial, lo recomiendo  al  110%.Es un juego que te introduce
I play this game way too much.

Five people enter: Four lucky survivor and one godforsaken creature.

The survivors either leave with casualties or don't leave at all.

The game plays like a 4v1 game of "hide and seek" while various hunters, themed after horror movies (one of them is from one) are out to find you, cut you up and hang you up for their eldritch deity to snack on you.

The survivors have to repair a select amount of generators to power up the escape doors and hopefully escape. All the killers have to do is paint the town red. Most of the game's tension comes from eluding the killer through sneaking and cunning, since survivors have no weapons to defend themselves with.

The game has some latency issues that are really noticable if you play a game with a killer who has a bad connection.

The game also features a perk system to allow both survivors and killers to become more efficient in their select specialities. You get points for it by doing your job as a survivor or killer, helping survivors in need or saving them from hooks, stunning the killer by knocking an obstacle in his ugly mug or pointing a flashlight at him, etc.

The game has a bit of grinding involved to get the lovely perks the characters have to offer but the challenges that you are offered on a daily basis really help speed things up, so it doesn't turn into the equivalent of your everyday MMO.

ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ğ¿ 
Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½ÑŒÑĞº Ğ¾Ğ¿ 
Ğ²ĞµĞ·Ğ´Ğµ Ğ´Ğ¸ÑĞ±Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ 

10/10

Unfortunately the game is trash. Shiny, with all these great licensed killers and cool cosmetics and a few great ideas, but trash at the end of the day. 

For example, either you have cheaters with subtle running hacks like almost every game or the game would be so bugged, that it is looking that way. The net code must be horrible then, I guess. As killer, if you  slay a survivor to the ground, the survivor moves to a different spot in the next second. As survivor, if the Huntress killer is throwing her hatchets at you, it may hit you even behind walls. - So, is that delay or a cheat? Btw, my ping is usually about 30ms in this game, thats good.

The game also has got obvious cheaters, who can fly around the map and can do all sorts of crazy things. The game's anti-cheat software EAC obviously doesn't work.

The player behavior is toxic to its bone for a large amount. What I blame the devs for. The game got toxic mechanics they do not want to get rid of since years. The game is literally griefing it's players. A lot of times, you just can't do anything while someone is cleaning the ground with your face. It's seems like a bad joke to me, that the devs are calling themselves Behavior Interactive, like they would mind good behavior or something, while it looks to me, like they would be breeding toxic players.

Yea, it's really too much BS in this game for some reason. I don't understand this, the game could do better. Probably they based their financial success on it or something, thats why they do not want it to change.

The game is looking awesome at first glance and the core gamedesign is highly addictive, but at the end of the day I always hate myself for playing it. 
It is just not working as expected. It is not working as the game I expect when I am thinking about it.

Frustrating, really, Dead by Daylight is not a good game after all.
jogo muito bom,bons controles e uma otima ideia,recomendaria a qualquer um

Todo empezo bien hasta que pasaron de poner contenido de pago como skins que no afectaban al juego a poner contenido que afecta a la jugabilidad como nuevos asesinos de pago (asesinos que desbalancean el juego).

While this game is fun with friends and can be scary I would say this game still has a lot of faults. Michael Myers is way over powered and just not fun to play against. Also people camp the hooks so no one can get you. Many, many bugs throughout the game as well. While its not broken it is really buggy. I would suggest getting it on sale just for the fact it doesnt have a lot of content. Still a good game to play with your buddies to end the night.
Nice game which has it's flaws. Some are getting fixed, some aren't. I rate it 3 out of 4 hooked survivors
